message:
I can still remember how devoted I was when I watched the first season of Toilet-Bound Hanako-kun, by the time I was a college weeb. But it became forgotten since the series hadn't been updated till the end of 2023, and it's only when I was browsing Crunchyroll today that I knew there's something new to check out.
In this post, I will record how I finish the new episodes of this work from the beginning to the end.
我可以仍然记得多么我是投入的，当我看《地缚少年花子君》的第一季的时候，那时我还是个大学生美奸。但渐渐地我忘掉了它因为这一剧集直到2023年末尾才更新，而仅仅在今天我在Crunchyroll上浏览时我才知道有新东西看了。
在这个帖子里，从头到尾我会记录如何我看完了这部作品的更新部分。
title: After-school Hanako-kun
